column5: thrones! theyre winged wheels covered in eyes.

steam recommended it to me a couple years ago, i wanna study medical anthropology and russian culture/history so naturally i fell in love with it. ive had an interest in their other games but i didnt know that they were from the same developers until pretty recently actually.

i think it really depends on what you value the most. im a romantic at my heart so i value emotions, imagination, nature, the past and the illogical which are all what the nocturnal ending places clear emphasis on. 

i love the kin and their culture, and i heavily sympathize with them. on the last day when they asked me not to pull the thorn, i found that i couldnt say no to them, and i couldnt go back on my promise to them. i really cant sacrifice the kin, the earth and miracles to have a ‘better ending’ and feel alright about that. 

i love ‘bad’ endings. typical happy endings where everyones alright tend to bore me. i prefer bad or bittersweet endings, i find they tend to be much more interesting and have a lot more to them. 

theres much much more to it i could say but im not sure how to say it and tbh im kinda high right now so im not sure if im making any sense.
its rather charming, i find...
prickly prick who will bury us all
steam recommended me pathologic classic hd when it was first released there, and i fell in love with the world.
its in the quest with capellas mothers music, where you have to go investigate piano music in houses
i dont have them with me but i love the interactions in p1 where aspity basically calls daniil an incel, and the one where daniil tries to get guns from alexander block for the kids.
oh, this is interesting. bless you for making this.
their designs in both games are so cute and soft, theyre like pugs.
oh god i absolutely LOVE this
var takes his place, theres no equivalent to willow though.

yes, far be it from me to call myself a person of mystical inclinations. however, when i look at you, i get the feeling that nature is playing jokes on us. its as if both the left and the right hand have clutched the head to realize for the first time that they are two parts of a single whole.
there often arent any markers in classic, you have to find out where to go by the quests and letters you have. what route are you on?
i love killing the bison, disappearing and shaman from the downtown by theodor bastard. i also really like the song that plays in the haruspexs lair and the broken heart pub.

yeah lmao 
ive been doing this since i was a kid, i intentionally seek out things that scare me because i love feeling freaked out, its fun
it feels surreal to see people with short sleeves or shorts and see their skin so blank and so smooth

i read something somewhere about the developers thinking about making their routes short and sweet ala marble nest, i dont have the link anymore. theyre having a lot of issues financially so supporting them by telling your friends is a good idea
you deserve a lot better, you should talk to him about it because thats honestly such bs
whenever a relationship ends i keep saying that im staying out of relationships from now on, and yet
not the similar title at all but K.O.L.M? its a browser game, one of my favorites, you start off almost blind and crawling around and have to repair yourself bit by bit.
i wish they had a physical copy of the art book, its gorgeous. my brother is used to working with metal so im planning on getting help making the brands out of brass

happens to the best of us, dw too much. the first time through i put the organs daniil asks for in the wrong place and i didnt feel like reloading, if youre running out of food just trade around, the kin and the men hanging out near infected or abandoned districts usually have food
i remember someone talking about how onision has sex in the same bed that his kids are sleeping in in one of the hansen interviews, i really hope the kids get taken away from them soon
i feel like i cant live if i dont have one
yeah. i want someone to reach out.
if you sh while taking a bath/shower they wont sting at all. i like the sting though, its a nice reminder

yeah lmao its kinda scary sometimes looking back at how exactly petty and violent i can be. i grew up in an angry & unpredictable environment so that plus my emotions going from 0 to 100 ends up with me being very very bitter
c’mon they keep calling artemiy a bear. i project a lot on him so hes gay & trans
this is... a really bad way of looking at self harm. everyone who self harms does it for a reason, people who do it ‘for attention’ have underlying issues and deserve compassion and respect too.
id do it a lot in high school, that and in gym changing rooms
yeah, i cant be happy unless i have an fp

just in case, in the long block, taya is on the second floor if i remember correctly. just go up the stairs closest to where you enter and youll have to walk down a well lit hallway and enter a door on your right. it took me a while to actually find her for the first time haha

pathologic really isnt as difficult as people make it out to be if youre prepared. if you know what youre doing and stock up on food and meds early on,  which wasnt an issue with artemiy and clara for me, it becomes a breeze on the other days. i kinda envy people who play it blind for the difficulty curve haha
i found a bread in there that saved me on the last day
i joke around about how deeply i hate myself and yet simultaneously being the biggest narcissist. ah, the duality of man.

its an ancient cure to injuries, as a kid when i got hurt my parents would tell me to let the dog lick it. its a habit i admittedly still have and ive never gotten an infection, but i recommend washing your wounds afterwards anyways.

comfort of a laugh track by roar, i cant listen to it anymore because my fp who abandoned me said it always reminded them of me. its about having issues with love, being alone, wanting to change yourself to be whatever they want, wanting the other person to pretend they love you and being abandoned by them. stuff like that.

my ex did something similar to me recently too, after promising me for years he would never leave me. admittedly id be lying if i said it doesnt hurt anymore. something ive found that really helps is to talk to people about it.

one of my friends had been through a similar experience too. we talked about it for a few hours and it did make me feel better, this feeling that we werent alone in this and someone else had been through it. while most of my friends havent been through a similar experience, being able to complain and vent about it helps instead of bottling it up. additionally, seeing and talking to a psychiatrist regularly and seeking help and coping strategies for bpd never hurt. 

while i dont know what your relationship consisted of, i know you didnt deserve to be tossed away. nobody deserves that. while it hurts, over time the pain will start to fade even if it takes a while. i wish you the best.
looking at post history, this person just has a big gore fetish :/
i know its late but i hope you managed to get to a hospital, best of luck <3
you might be able to find the right ones later on, or brew some if you have any infected organs and tinctures. if you really cant, the wrong ones are better than nothing.
i used to bring safety pins into class. very subtle.
catch 22, i cant love someone unless theyre my fp and dating an fp leads to severe issues very quickly.
i think the hospital i went to must have been pretty fucked, they kicked me out after 5 days even though i was admitted for threatening suicide and kept begging them to let me stay.

ive always had thoughts like that, ever since i was a child, and its since become just a normal part of my life. ive always ended up obsessing over thoughts of hurting and killing people who have hurt me, it doesnt feel fair that they can get away with it without any consequences.
thats actually not true, ive had psychosis since i was a kid, i know my delusions are delusions but doesnt stop me from believing it.
i feel like i wasnt meant to live past 18, and in the most literal sense sometimes. i feel like i killed myself a long time ago and im just piloting a corpse.
thats something i worry about a lot, i dont wanna make my friends feel like they didnt do enough for me...
perception by deep end games?
my chemical romance, often times bullets. im an emo kid perpetually stuck in 2005.

ive been with four people total, three of which werent my fp. looking back on it i feel bad for them because i always loved my fp more than i loved them, and id always pay more attention to my fp. it wasnt fair to them. 

im still friends with two of the people ive dated and ive talked to them about this and they say theyre not upset and they dont blame me for it, which is comforting i guess.
the one thing i can tell you from experience is that nobody cares. just smile and be friendly to the cashier, nobodys gonna ask any questions.
feels like someone talking nonsense close to me in the room. its caused me to jump and look around quite a few times.

i joke around a lot about being some lovesick victorian boy because of how dramatically i feel everything. when im upset i need to lie down because i feel like im suddenly running a fever and im about to faint. 

when my bf dumped me i thought i was actually going to die, my heart hurt so so badly i thought it was gonna give out.

most ways of dying involve pain of some kind, pain is as much of an inevitability in death as it is in life. 

ive found a way thats pretty quick and relatively painless that im fixated on, but its rather complicated and time constricted, so its kind of a win/win on either dying pretty painlessly or not being able to go through with it and staying alive for another year.

ive been changing it about once or twice a year since college but in high school id change it at least once a month, if not every other week or so. i started dying my hair when i was around 8/10 so i havent had my natural color since then and i hate it when people suggest it.

i dont have anything against brown hair on others but for me its just so boring and plain.

i look at my behavior and its just, god, i feel like if i were worse id be some kind of creep from a thriller or whatever haha. its really bad, i have to constantly remind myself and work to tone down the crazy.

yeah its. not fun. im ugly and im hard to even enjoy being around because im a lot and i cant or wont tone myself down to appeal to people. when someone genuinely choses me, to date or to get close to, its usually because they feel bad for me or wanna fix me, and they quickly realize im too much and want out. 

funny enough, from what the other comments were saying, the only person whos ever wanted me in a relationship way because they actually loved me, and that im still very close to despite everything is a woman. im a gay man so thats not really gonna work out.
its to protect myself from getting hurt again. if i can hate someone and push them away first, i dont have to deal with them abandoning me and rejecting me.
people who use those things as an argument against you really arent worth your time ngl. its a lot more complicated than that, people who do it for attention deserve love and respect.
eventually, sooner or later, it happens once again...

put pressure against them until they stop bleeding, when they do carefully clean them with (preferably unscented) soap. if youve been cutting deeper, its good to get some butterfly bandaids to help keep them closed. thatll help prevent bigger scars, let them heal faster, and protect against infection. 

its useful to make an emergency first aid kit, just in case. getting some gauze and some sanitized pads is good if they wont stop bleeding, and to help protect the cuts against getting irritated & reopening, as well as keeping them clean. 

id also recommend getting normal bandaids and some polysporin to help with infection. deeper cuts are more prone to infection, even if you take close care of them. 

sorry if i ended up ranting a bit, please stay safe.
styro or deeper these days. i used to cut shallower but i hadnt cut in over a year and something really bad happened and i really want it to scar and i like when it aches afterwards a bit.

the best way to tell someone ive found is to just find a time when theyre not busy or you two are hanging out and ask if they have time to talk about something personal and serious. 

if its easier you can always text them about it, telling someone about it can get really emotional really fast, and its often easier to text people things than to tell them in person. 
really how you tell them is up to you, but i personally find it better to just tell them outright and talk about it from there. 

good luck, im hoping the best for you ♥️

a couple years ago i got the courage to go to a shaving store and get some good quality double sided razors, ive been using that ever since. a lot sharper & cleaner & therefore safer than whatever sharp things i could scrounge up before. 

i liked branding a lot too since its a sharp intense pain that fades pretty quickly but i lost the things i used to do it with.
ive been going through a bad time and honestly being able to talk to people on here has helped...
i used to get the whole ‘bugs crawling under my skin’ thing before meds, as well as feeling like someone was breathing on my neck, little things like that

i wish i could but lack of resources keeps me stuck. admittedly i fantasize a lot about taking a handful of belongings and clothes and driving hours to some small rural town somewhere and getting a job as a waiter and just becoming a new person with a new name, and vanishing again when i get tired of that. 

unfortunately i think in this day and age its a lot harder to up and vanish.

it feels like such a cruel joke, this obsession was born from abandonment and a deep seeded fear of further abandonment and yet it scares and drives people away. despite this i still cant help myself.
nah, i dont count simply because ive never tried to quit. i stopped for about a year because of my now ex, but it was less about me and more about making him happy.

oof, i feel you. my bf dumped me because he never actually had feelings for me and he only felt bad for me, im admittedly still not over it. do you have any friends you can vent to? ive found that being angry at my ex helps, being angry feels better than being miserable. 

if theres anything i can really tell you, you deserved someone better than someone who just lied about loving you.
i have mommy and daddy issues and its not a sexual thing but i find im constantly trying to find new parents in older people. getting attention and validation from them is really really nice.
i know its a bit late but do you have any butterfly bandages? itll help keep the wound closed and will heal up better.
is there a specific reason you self harm? is it just for the pain or do you need to see blood/an injury afterwards, anything like that?

im so so so paranoid of being used by people that ill overanalyze any small shred of kindness as someone trying to take advantage of me, and due to my history with being used i automatically assume people have bad intentions. i have to actively keep finding reasons why theyre not manipulating me, that theyre just being kind because theyre a kind person. 

however, if that person is my fp i stop giving a shit and thats when things get unpleasant. i would tear myself apart if it would make them happy and want to be close to me.

i know my cousin and one of my exes do genuinely love and care for me, for their sake id rather just be declared as missing rather than them knowing i killed myself. kinda feels more merciful that way for them, they dont have to feel guilty that they ‘didnt do enough’ for me.

i feel i was meant to have killed myself as a child or a teenager, so now that im 21 i feel like im much too old and living on borrowed time, and ill up and finally get it over with sooner or later. 

my life has been pretty miserable since i was young so i feel like its my punishment for not having done it.
every time someone told me they loved me it was to use me, out of pity or because they wanted to fix me somehow so, its really hard to believe now
in a way its so much more visceral, its cutting open flesh and seeing blood... other ways of self harm arent seen as as violent and visceral as cutting yourself knowingly and willingly.
for me, playing video games keep my hands and mind busy, and calling up friends and talking about whatever or venting if i need to helps a lot
nah, ive never gotten any stitches for mine because i dont wanna be a bother. butterfly closures can be helpful for that if you are worried but dont wanna get stitches.
did you clean it up properly? it never hurts to put some polysporin on wounds
tattoos feel exactly like cutting to me too, and i cant cut on my wrists anymore because i dont wanna cut over the tattoos there, which hold a lot of sentimental value to me
my exes friend told him that id be abusive because i have bpd, hearing that was way more upsetting than anyone ive told it to thinks it was
i wanna finally get help for my bpd

not to be an emo kid in 2020 but ive always listened to my chemical romance a lot. early sunsets over monroeville and demolition lovers hit different. i listened to the latter a lot when i was dumped.

i have about a dozen and a half reasons haha. i started as a kid because i was a very angry and moody child and i was raised in an environment where any negative emotion was frowned on, so it came out in intense bursts where i needed SOME sort of sensation. 

in high school, i started cutting due to self hatred, as a way to punish myself, as a way to cope with overly strong emotions, as a distraction and delusions involving blood. eventually that morphed into just this daily part of my life, to the point where i would get uncomfortable when i didnt have fresh injuries.
